CareServiceVisitPlan.name: CareServiceVisitPlan
CareServiceVisitPlan.description: Associates a service request with the series of visits that are planned as part of that visit. The series of visits is represented using MaintenancePlan.

ApprovedVisitCount.description: The number of approved visits in the planned care service.

AssignedVisitCount.description: The number of visits assigned with resources in a planned service.

AuthorizationReferenceId.description: The care request item that’s the record of authorization for the visit.

CarePlanContextId.description: The ID of the care plan, care plan detail, goal assignment, or action plan associated with the care service visit.

CompletedVisitCount.description: The number of visits that have been completed as part of the service.

CreatedVisitCount.description: The number of created visits in the planned care service.

IsServiceAuthorizationRequired.description: Indicates whether the service has to be authorized before it’s provided.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

ServiceRequestId.description: The service request for the service.

UnassignedVisitCount.description: The number of unassigned visits in a planned service.

VisitPlanId.description: The series of visits planned for a service.
